list.item: Comfortably model assignment problems with a fluent API.
Contains an in-memory database system, providing tools to model and manage data with an extensive query system. A synchronized cache system enabling to make complex queries with a constant runtime.
Get reports reasoning the solution's rating, equipping you with the tools to understand your problems.
Model inter dependent problems in order to work on complex interactions.
x64, ARM and RISC-V are supported and tested.
